channel.title: Flexdashboard on Will Carcamo
channel.description: Recent content in Flexdashboard on Will Carcamo

item.title: Building Dashboards with Flexdashboard
item.description: Dashboards The package flexdashboard makes it easy to create dashboards. I used the mtcars dataset to create an example of a dashboard. I first tried to host the dashboard embedded within this post but the output in the YAML is set to call flexdashboard instead of the html output file even though the flexdashboard produces the dashboard in html. When I first tried to host the dashboard here the format was thrown off.
